text: Not a big park but still have plenty of space for people to jog and do exercise. There is a underpass that connects Ang Mo Kio to Serangoon Garden. I did not know that till I walked here and explore it.

Though there is on going construction to make way for MRT line development.
It’s calming at night watching the moon…
Great place to chill and run on a weekday evening. Definitely keeping me healthy! Have to go on more slow jogs in this chill environment

Better after the running track is replaced with greyish cement rather than the previous black bitumen track. Place is brighter and joggers can see if there are rats or any other creatures running across tracks.
Medium size park with much promise. Could definitely improve its dog run facilities and some playground apparatuses.
